content.label: I only play the daily one. Ignore all the other. But, for quite some time been thinking of deleting this. When you only get 11 or 12 cards to play with.....very hard to get a good score. Only want to play for fun. Spending 2,000 golf bucks for 5 measly cards that usually won’t on even give you one play is ridiculous!!
Love it!!! So great!

I love this game and have been playing it for a couple years.however,I am frustrated and liking it less and less. You stick that ice in the game and it becomes impossible to win or even enjoy. Too bad. I really liked (past tense) that game!

Still hate that ice. Cannot play those games!

Get rid of the ice. I so enjoyed this game until ice!!!!

title.label: i used to like this game

content.label:
Update11-2020
And now while daily game - whackamole
I get some kind of forced reward which blocks whackamole.  So much for a reward.
And this is after having to start gsme twice before menu unfreezes.  Ugh!

frustrated by insistence to use traitorous facebook

dont like ads that freeze and require me to restart my device

dont want to sell my friends for a stamp
I am having a terrible time getting anyone to listen. My game is stuck on negative points. I cannot get it to change. Please help or I shall have to give up this game that I love.

Thanks to the latest update, I now have to open this game twice to get rid of the "Fairway Store" at the bottom of the screen, which does not go away when you touch the X to close it.  Most of the time, since I need to exit the game to get that to go away, I just go away.  Probably not what the developer intended.
crap
Lately game freezes up at the store and won’t open any other page. I can’t play it - needs fix please
Stupid pop up on startup makes it impossible to play.  You have to quit and restart.  Buggy.
Haven’t been able to play for 2 days. Screen seems to be frozen at the fairway shop. Frustrating!
Frozen game stop working
This is a great game except for one thing. It keeps crashing on certain video ads and today crashed in Fairways own ad. If I didn’t have over 200,000 gulf bucks, I’d remove it from my iPad.

But recent updates have made it impossible to win without using all sorts of power-ups.  I’ve been playing this for more than 5 years and even purchased the ad free version.   I’ve built up a pretty good supply of golf bucks but now it dwindles everyday.  Once that’s gone, I’ll delete the game.  It’s a shame because is used to be great

But on my iPhone 11, with IOS 14, it’s impossible to close the app or use anything else. I have to lock the phone multiple times to be able to swipe it closed.

2 weeks later:
Now I can’t quit out of the game without powering off my phone. If I get a text message, I’m able to tap on it and then my phone will work again.

Somewhat disappointed there’s no response to my original review.

Fairways on Big Fish says update available we hit the update and nothing happens we cannot get into this Big Fish at all we paid golf clubs for extra golf balls and paid for right to play this Solataire golf and you block us.  Completely unacceptable but you got us and I will never let that happen to us again my rating is zero which matches your assistance

I’ve been playing for about three years, and for the past threeish months it has turned into them trying to force you into having to pay for items to win the hands. Instead of being able to accumulate golf bucks, I consistently end up spending more than I make after finishing the daily courses. If I end up down at zero I will probably stop playing. I will not spend money just to play a game.
Super fun and addictive

title.label: I wish I had the old version.

content.label: The game changed a bunch since a few years back and now the balancing is way off. It only takes until the second page of courses to see that they give you fewer cards to play with and the shuffling on the board is now meant to force you into using special items to win. Gone are the days when the items were meant to be used sparsely to get you out of a rut, they are now a requirement. This makes the game much less fun to play, despite the increase in bells, whistles, and courses to play. Shame on this industry for failing to keep the old, better product alive and removing it from the store altogether.

title.label: Not what it used to be.

content.label: A few years ago I played this game and loved it. It was a blast. It’s no longer designed for fun, but just to make them money. The games are not winnable without buying something with points or paying cash. Takes ALL of the fun out of The game the was it’s designed now. Save your time and money and skip this game.
Love it!

This is a fun game, but... very quickly gets soonest impossible to win without the need for boosters or extra cards. There are some available that you can earn. The problem is the levels get so challenging that it is nearly impossible to get through them without the boosters, so you use them up very quickly. Not to worry! You can purchase boosters! You're able to play without progressing, but what fun is that? I would try a different game. Tri-peaks isn't bad. Much better than this. Another one I like is solitaire grand harvest. 
This game is getting very close to be deleted. It's just too frustrating. I refuse to pay to play a game when there are so many good ones that are free.

Great game must try
Thanks outstanding game

title.label: Very nice and fun, but... (Yes, the BUT) (updated)

content.label:
Well, the "but" is that in no more fun, just nice. Why? Because BigFish changed the algorithms to made this excellent game into a P2W game: if you don't pay, you are loosing your time. 
Anyway, with the last two updates, the game has become unstable in a iPad3, iPadMini1 and even in my IPadAir: It crash constantly, I can't even open it! 
If you guys fix all those bugs, you'll have my 5 stars again! Thanx!
PD: Yes, all your 5 points ratings are for the oldest version of the game, no for the last 4 updates. Shame on you! Thx!
Was up to level 468 then went to play only to find out  the game reset to level 1 with absolutely no way of getting    midas clubs

Update - talk about p2p. Card decks went down from 20+ cards to 8, 9, and 10 cards. Why? So that we spend money. Luckily I have 700k golf bucks but I’ve already spent 300k and know that I’ll continue. I’ll delete when it hits zero. This game isn’t the same.
——————————————————————————
However, the amount of stupid pop advertisements now have pushed me away from the game. What was once a game that I played at every moment that I had downtime has become a game that I open once every week or couple of weeks. 

It’s sad that these companies get money just try and want to take as much money from you as they can, but it’s unfortunately to be expected.

This game has way to many in app purchases. The rewards you can get for free are pitiful and it’s all about them trying to get you to buy there golf bucks. I’m happy to watch videos for a decent reward but watching a video for 200 golf bucks when it costs 2000 to get 5 more cards is just awful.
Every game is different and a challenge

My favorite game, I play it religiously. Feedback, I would say is prices are incredibly high. I love the endless lives, and the length of the game. It never ends. Please add more background the use of the same screens two weeks apart is boring. If I see the stupid news paper background I’ll lose my mind. New backgrounds are exciting and a fun part of the game.
I love this game.

Love the game but now with the new updates it comes with more advertising. After your done with one set of a game there is an ad for something even if you X it goes to your App Store . I wish this was gone it makes the games more enjoyable.
This was a great game until this week. Now it crashes and I have to delete and reinstall every time I want to play 😡

During the last week, it has been difficult playing the games. Not enjoyable so I have limited the number of times I play. The games that have the cards that “freeze” is particularly frustrating.
Now, all the games are frozen. It’s not possible to get in to play any of them.
It makes you think about your next move and make decisions quickly

Been playing this game for 5 yrs. however now it seems its almost impossible to win the daily challenges.  I mean how do you play with 10 cards?  Used to be good. But now i guess they want players to spend money to buy hints and helps.
I’m tired of not getting anything from when I play the daily games it’s been a few months now better fix it or I’m going to find other solitaire games
Cool game makes you really think of your next move

A worthy top-of-my-list game that I look forward to playing daily. In which, since my last review stating suggestions of improvement, has in fact delivered said suggestions. Therefore, making this game more enjoyable and able to remain at the top of my list of daily games to pursue.
Enjoyable game and not pressured to “buy” things to get ahead. I’ve only played a few levels so far though.

I have  been playing it for a long time. Came back to it and noticed certain things and power ups I had no longer there like, X-ray the ability to see the upcoming card amongst other power ups. This game was so fun to play now is just extremely difficult. Seems like they want you to spend money. I will delete the game and try again in a few months. So disappointing.

Another formerly good game that was spoiled by changing to F2P. You can only progress so far before you are forced to start spending money if you want to win a board. It’s fun for a few hours, then just delete it and move on.

title.label: Finally uninstalled this waste of time!

content.label: I’ve been playing this game since 2013 - purchased it after one week of play. It has become unplayable lately due to the new difficulty  level they seem to have added - likely a money grab from the developers. Why bother sending out surveys when you won’t do what your fan base is requesting?
Good fun

title.label: It’s a great game with bad management

content.label: The money hungry greediness is very obvious. They know they have a fun game but have taken to a level of greediness that devalues the game. If you play for more than five minutes you will see how they have put different ways to earn cash in front of actual play value. I used to love this game but these days it feels like I have to pay to play... It is so unfortunate.
Terrific game love the graphics and color.Terrific game love the graphics and color.

I’ve been playing this game for years, and while it can be fun, it’s not a game for card players. The solitaire layouts are anything but random and card players using reasonable expectations for draw cards will be sorely disappointed.  The layouts eventually become so one sided that players are forced to use multiple “power up” items to clear levels and move on.
Love 👍

I have been playing this game for years and it use to be fun to play. All of a sudden I’m getting less cards in the draw pile, sometimes I only get 6 or 8 cards.  Also when I play & get golf bucks, if I stop & come back later I lose what I had. I’m also losing tiers or it doesn’t move at all. I’m thinking of getting rid of this game & find something else to play, unless they fix these problems.
Do not play this game , you can’t complete courses without spending a lot of money for progression!!! I wish these kinds of ptw games were illegal !!!

title.label: Too frustrating, bad for my blood pressure

content.label: I have been playing this for more years than I can remember but no more. The courses have become unplayable, impossible to move on and I don’t need that in my life right now.  Maybe I’ll try again in 5 years or so.
Playing for years. Gradually getting more difficult to complete any course without using lots of irons. Sure it makes for better business for developers but not so fun to play anymore.
I got a new iPad. Lost game. Had to start from scratch. I lost over 100,000 golf bucks.
